ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Special Train Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Special Train') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed'), NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True,
OR(ISBLANK( NS_ItemdispatchedOrigin__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Origin prior to closing the Case.
